22847.name: Gradient Position: average them seriously
22847.description:
Confused about the position of gradient colors is 50% or not?

It will show you and average them at the same distance with just one click.


Any questions or suggestions, contact me: nowork.app@gmail.com

22711.name: Vibrant
22711.description:
Extract prominent colors from an image (Vibrant, lightVibrant, darkVibrant, Muted, lightMuted, darkMuted)

To create this plugin i have used as code base Dominant Color Toolkit plugin.


This plugin is open source, you can find the code here : https://github.com/lea37/figma-vibrant


You can contribute to the code or reuse it to do a better, smarter plugin ðŸ™‚

22753.name: Figma2xaml
22753.description: This plugin can help you convert simple vector paths to xaml (eXtensible Application Markup Language). Don't forget to simplify all the elements into vector paths using the commands "Flatten" and "Outline Stroke".

22568.name: Compress Frames
22568.description:
Export compressed frames from Figma


Compress icon by icons8

22291.name: Spirous
22291.description:
To make working with spirographs fun again and usable in UI designs, we at Zeta built spirous which can mathematically generate beautiful vectors with desired shape, color, stroke width and insert them on the Figma artboard.


Here's what the plugin offers you: 


  • Hand-picked templates to try out
  • Customise spirograph based on color, stroke width and other config options
  • Insert spirograph directly in the art board by clicking anywhere on the preview panel
  • Create and save custom spirographs
  • Feature to randomise spirograph config for generating new patterns


First-time plugin usage:


  • Run the Spirous plugin
  • Choose from hand-picked templates
  • Select the template you like
  • Insert selected template by clicking anywhere on preview panel
  • That's it!! Now use the beautiful Spirograph in your designs

22254.name: Selection Variants
22254.description: See and control all nested variants instances in selection. Switch between variants without clicking through to find all the nested ones. Switch variants in bulk by selecting multiple objects â€” useful when working with lists or tables.

22614.name: Copy names for Json
22614.description: One click copy file names, and you can choose the suffix!

22285.name: Localazy Plugin
22285.description:
What's Localazy?

Localazy is a continuous localization platform and web-based translation management system (TMS) that strives to make the usually awful software localization and translation experience efficient and enjoyable for individuals and product teams of any size.


Why Figma and Localazy?

So you can start localizing your designs in Figma right away! 


Localazy Figma Plugin allows you to upload all the text content from a Figma file to Localazy, translate the content into as many languages as you want, and then download translated content back to Figma to create localized designs quickly.


All the texts uploaded to Localazy are also immediately ready to be transferred into your mobile/web projects or other types of client UIs for a streamlined multilingual development experience.


Common issues with designs

Hereâ€™s a list of problems that might surprise you unprepared during the design process.

  • Bi-directionality (LTR/RTL) of languages
  • Distribution of word lengths in various languages
  • Copying strings from design to code (time-consuming duplications)
  • Continuous design localization problem & keeping track of updates
  • and moreâ€¦


Figma Plugin by Localazy helps to resolve these problems with ease.


How do I start?

  1. In your project, go to the Plugins and select Localazy
  2. Connect your existing project on Localazy (if you don't have an account make you register and create one first)
  3. Go back to Figma and upload your texts


Documentation:

https://localazy.com/docs/figma


NOTE: To use Localazy Figma Plugin, you need to activate the Localazy Autopilot Plan subscription or higher.

22824.name: Knob Creator
22824.description:
Welcome to Figma Knob Creator


Knob Creator is a Figma plugin to create knob stack images. These can be used for creating themes for digital audio workstations, VST plugins and more. The aim of this plugin is to make this as easy as possible.


Go to the Howto Page page for an explanation on how to use this plugin.


Contribute


If you would like to contribute, you can do it by:


  • Fork the repo, add your code and create a PR
  • Buy me a coffee


Issues


Did you run into issues, or have any feature requests? Add them here.

22381.name: Select The Same Instance
22381.description:
Allows you to select only instances with a specific variant from within a selection such as a group or frame. This can be used, for example, to select only those buttons in the selection that have a Size of Big and a Shape of Round.


How To Use

  1. Select the group or frame that contains the instance you want to select.
  2. Activate this plug-in.
  3. Choose the Component Set name.
  4. Select all the values of the variant you want to select.
  5. Press the Select button.


Is it difficult to understand? Please refer to the video.

https://cloud.nju33.com/6LKZbultMemOiNSamKev

22331.name: Figma Tokens Inspector
22331.description:
Allows to inspect design tokens set by Figma Tokens Plugin without risk of accidental breaking tokens.


Works even on components from Design Librariers!
